title: Supplication Before Sleeping
text: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

title: Supplication Upon Waking Up
text: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us, and unto Him is the resurrection.

title: Supplication Entering the Bathroom
text: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from male and female devils.

title: Supplication Leaving the Bathroom
text: I ask You for Your forgiveness.

title: Supplication Before Eating
text: In the name of Allah.

title: Supplication If Forgetting Bismillah at the Beginning of a Meal
text: In the name of Allah at its beginning and at its end.

title: Supplication After Eating
text: All praise is for Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.

title: Supplication Entering the Mosque
text: O Allah, open for me the gates of Your mercy.

title: Supplication Leaving the Mosque
text: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

title: Supplication Before Performing Ablution
text: In the name of Allah.

title: Supplication After Performing Ablution
text: I bear witness that there is no deity worthy of worship except Allah alone with no partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and Messenger. O Allah, make me among those who repent and purify themselves.

title: Supplication When Dressing
text: All praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.

title: Supplication When Undressing
text: In the name of Allah.

title: Supplication Before Leaving the House
text: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

title: Supplication Upon Entering the House
text: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

title: Supplication for Mounting an Animal or Vehicle
text: Glory is to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it by our efforts. Surely, to our Lord we will return.

title: Supplication When Starting a Journey
text: O Allah, we ask You on this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that please You.

title: Supplication Upon Entering the Market
text: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is ever-living and does not die. In His hand is all good, and He is over all things competent.

title: Supplication Upon Hearing Good News
text: All praise is for Allah.

title: Supplication Upon Hearing Bad News
text: Indeed, to Allah we belong and to Him we shall return.
